colla.kernel.api

Interface CollATask

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Task

    public interface CollATask
    A task is an application to submit to run on the hosts. It will return a result, if any, or a ticket to fetch a result from some host.
    Author:
    Diogo Matos

      • hasTicket

        boolean hasTicket()
        Checks if the task has a ticket to fetch a result, otherwise the result is already included to the task.
        Returns:
        true if it has a ticket, false otherwise

      • setTicket

        void setTicket(CollATicket ticket)
        Parameters:
        ticket - A ticket to make the result of an application available to group members who submitted the task.

      • getTicket

        CollATicket getTicket()
        Returns:
        a ticket to permit that group members who submitted the task can fetch the result of an application from the host.

      • removeTicket

        boolean removeTicket()
        Removes a ticket previously set
        Returns:
        true if it has a ticket, false otherwise

      • setTaskID

        void setTaskID(java.lang.Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - identification number of the task

      • getTaskID

        java.lang.Long getTaskID()
        Returns:
        the task ID

      • getSchedule

        java.util.Date getSchedule()
        Returns:
        task schedule

      • setSchedule

        void setSchedule(java.util.Date date)
        Parameters:
        date - Date to schedule task to run. It might be null so the task will run as soon as a host is available.

      • hasSchedule

        boolean hasSchedule()
        Returns:
        true if the task has a schedule, false otherwise

        Destructor
